group.name: aggregator
group.desc: Aggregates a collection of models for a given model id

points.name: UN
points.label: UN
points.desc: Update Number.  Incrementing number each time the mapping is changed.  If the number is not changed from the last reading the direct access to a specific offset will result in reading the same logical model as before.  Otherwise the entire model must be read to refresh the changes

points.name: Ctl
points.label: Control
points.desc: Control register for all aggregated devices

points.name: CtlVnd
points.label: Vendor Control
points.desc: Vendor control register for all aggregated devices

points.name: CtlVl
points.label: Control Value
points.desc: Numerical value used as a parameter to the control
